meanings.definition: A book size resulting from folding a sheet of paper into twelve leaves or twenty-four pages.
meanings.sent1: I prefer reading twelvemo books because they are easy to carry around.
meanings.sent2: The library had a section dedicated to twelvemo books.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally sat on a twelvemo book and now it's a paperweight.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were neatly organized in her mind like a twelvemo book.
meanings.sent5: The twelvemo book was so small, it fit in the palm of my hand.

meanings.sent1: She purchased a twelvemo to read on her commute.
meanings.sent2: The twelvemo was filled with beautiful illustrations.
meanings.sent3: The twelvemo book looked like a tiny treasure chest.
meanings.sent4: His ideas were packed tightly into the twelvemo.
meanings.sent5: The twelvemo book was so cute, it made her smile.
